Q_NAME: Student Details using Static Data Member & Static Member Function
Q_DESC:
Create a class called student representing roll number and name. Include following member functions:

getnextroll(): to automatically generate next roll number.
getdata(): to automatically assign roll number and read name.
displaydata(): to display student roll number and name.

Note: 
Include a static member nextroll in the class and let getnextroll() be a static member function.
Initialize nextroll to 1101.

Input:
First line: No. of students, n.
Subsequent lines: names of n students.

Output:
The output must print all students roll number and name.
TESTCASE_1:
10
John 
Peter
Siva
Anbu
SRM
eLab
eCurricula
eThink
eLearn
eResume
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
1101 John
1102 Peter
1103 Siva
1104 Anbu
1105 SRM
1106 eLab
1107 eCurricula
1108 eThink
1109 eLearn
1110 eResume
